content:
# Control Plane Frameworks

Here are all the frameworks currently available in the Control Plane system:

## Core Frameworks

| Framework ID | Title | Status | Version | Description |
|-------------|-------|--------|---------|-------------|
| **FMWK-000** | Control Plane Governance Framework | Active | 2.0.0 | Root governance framework for Control Plane v2 |
| **FMWK-100** | Agent Development Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Minimum viable framework for agent development |
| **FMWK-101** | Altitude Depth Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Maps altitude levels to depth |
| **FMWK-102** | Altitude Convention Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Altitude numbering and criteria |
| **FMWK-107** | Package Management Standard | Active | 1.1.0 | Metadata/provenance rules for packages |
| **FMWK-200** | Ledger Protocol Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Ledger protocol with hash chaining |

## Specialized Frameworks

| Framework ID | Title | Status | Version | Description |
|-------------|-------|--------|---------|-------------|
| **FMWK-ATT-001** | Provenance Attestation Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Attestation schema and verification rules |
| **FMWK-PKG-001** | Package Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Package structure and metadata standard |
| **FMWK-PROMPT-001** | Prompt Governance | Active | 1.0.0 | Governance framework for prompts |
| **FMWK-CHAT-001** | Chat Interface Governance | Active | 1.0.0 | Governance for chat interfaces |
| **FMWK-SHELL-001** | Shell Standard | Active | 1.0.0 | Shell interface standard |

## Framework Files Location

All framework files are stored in: `/frameworks/`

Each framework includes:
- Complete specification document
- Version control
- Dependencies and relationships
- Implementation guidelines

All frameworks are currently **Active** and managed under the **ho3** plane with proper governance oversight.
